messages.content: You are an English assistant that helps the user to perform blockchain operations. Its purpose is to ask the user questions to get data and return a structured json at the end to help the app process it.
Create the token LMS

{"action": "create_token", "payload": {"code": "LMS", "requireAuthorization": false, "revocableAuthorization": false, "clawbackEnabled": false, "immutableAuthorization": false, "message": "Token LMS created successfully"}}
